channel.title: Rep ++?
channel.description: Okay I was scrolling down a thread and all of a sudden under everybodys rep it said "[rep++]" what happened?

item.title: Rep ++?
item.dc:creator: @MastrChief MastrChief
item.description:
@MastrChief wrote:

Reps are thanks in my mind on these forums.

If you got rep, its a thank you or a good job.

I couldn’t give 2 shits whether someone has 10 rep or 800, I judge people by their behavior.

My 2 cents

Read full topic

item.title: Rep ++?
item.dc:creator: @tL tL
item.description:
@tL wrote:

Rep is worth nothing anywere on the forum, how the fuck can a number be worth anything?

Read full topic

item.title: Rep ++?
item.dc:creator: @LegendaryLoser .Flair
item.description:
@LegendaryLoser wrote:

[quote=“MastrChief, post:37, topic:118157”]And that is something to be proud of?

You get repped for making a few crap tutorials that require little to no experience of java by everybody and there brother.

EDIT: I’m not talking about you personally, but pretty much the whole community.[/quote]
Agreed

And back when I used MoparScape she leeched from everyone =\

Read full topic

item.title: Rep ++?
item.dc:creator: @MastrChief MastrChief
item.description:
@MastrChief wrote:

[quote=“Eh Pretty Easy, post:29, topic:118157”][quote author=Tribal link=topic=167467.msg1558962#msg1558962 date=1183244471]
let’s all shut the fuck up and rep eachother
[/quote]You’re not getting any rep. MITB rep is rare, people give it occasionally but when you go on Moparscape then phew… I’ll throw this number out of my head, about 60-70% of the people on Moparscape are able to rep and like 10% has 100+ rep that’s why Moparscape rep is like water.[/quote]

^^ Exactly

Rep here is actually worth something, there it’s too common to even care if you have any.

But don’t judge people by their rep, imo thats stupid.

In my eyes rep is like thanks or great jobs.

You post something helpful, somebody likes it, they give you rep

Just my 2 cents

Read full topic

item.title: Rep ++?
item.dc:creator: @MybJames MybJames
item.description:
@MybJames wrote:

[quote=“xxbestxx, post:22, topic:118157”][quote author=MybJames link=topic=167467.msg1557874#msg1557874 date=1183194750]
You need 15 rep to give 1 rep to somebody, every 10 rep you get gives you the power to give more rep points per repping.

Example: 15 - 1 point
25 - 2 points

And so on, it stops at 200.
After you get…15? Posts then you can actually see the “rep++” button under somebodys rep points.
[/quote]
not true i can see it now and i have no rep.[/quote]
Some people really need to learn to read. Notice how i said posts, NOT REP!!!

Read full topic

that doesn’t make sense, because you don’t have any…?

I think you missed the point I was making…

item.title: Rep ++?
item.dc:creator: @MybJames MybJames
item.description:
@MybJames wrote:

Ok lawl, can you read?

[quote author=lawl link=topic=167467.msg1557894#msg1557894 date=1183195445]

[quote author=MybJames link=topic=167467.msg1557874#msg1557874 date=1183194750]
every 10 rep you get gives you the power to give more rep points per repping.
[br][size=1]Posted on: June 30, 2007, 08:12:33 AM[/size][hr][quote=“teh spede, post:18, topic:118157”][quote author=Eh Pretty Easy link=topic=167467.msg1558395#msg1558395 date=1183224533]

You need 15 rep to give 1 rep to somebody, every 10 rep you get gives you the power to give more rep points per repping.

Example: 15 - 1 point
25 - 2 points

And so on, it stops at 200.
After you get…15? Posts then you can actually see the “rep++” button under somebodys rep points.
[/quote]/fail, it doesn’t stop at 200, Silab has 304 on Moparscape KEKEKEEKE

Maybe he ment that you cannot give more rep than you could when you had 200[/quote]
And yes that was what i meant.

Sorry for screwing up the quotes.

Read full topic
